roleset.name: connect into a network, metaphorical or otherwise
roleset.note: NETWORK-V NOTES: Based on WSJ. Member of VNcls mix-22.1-2-1. (from network.01-v)
NETWORKING-N NOTES: Frames file for 'network' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from networking.01-n predicate notes)

example.name: not really verbal
example.text: Novell, a computer networking concern, fell 1 1/2 to 30 on 152,000 shares.

example.name: not really verbal
example.text: I-1 'm also learning a lot about computers like %um like about other things about computers like about %um you know how to do email and how-2 PRO-1 to do like networking *T*-2.

example.name: Args 1 & 2
example.text: The specification does not, however, disclaim the networking of mainframes to a central computer that is devoted to database.
